name: Molten Perforator
desc: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.
notes:
The Molten Perforator is a boss item in Risk of Rain 2, dropped by the   Magma Worm. 
When the holder damages an enemy, there is a 10% chance that 3 magma balls will spawn, each exploding with a radius of 7m, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) total damage and   igniting enemies.
Each magma ball has a proc coefficient of 0.7. 


== Notes ==
Correction: This item does total damage, meaning it deals 300% of the damage of the hit that triggered it, not 300% base damage.
While the magma balls tend to miss small enemies like   Alloy Vultures, they work exceptionally well against large enemies like   Elder Lemurians and bosses.
Having an  Ignition Tank makes the magma balls inflict   Stronger Burn instead of   Burn, dealing incredible damage.
